1.0.name: wordpress/bsod
1.0.description: BSoD for WordPress is a replacement for your 404 WordPress pages. It will show a BSoD when a visitor get an 404 Request Response. NB: This plugin was developed to honor the partnership between Microsoft and WordPress :)
